entry.title: Friday: Periods of rain or snow. Temperature steady near plus 2.
entry.summary: Periods of rain changing to flurries near noon and ending this afternoon then cloudy. Wind becoming west 30 km/h gusting to 50 this afternoon. Temperature steady near plus 2. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 5:30 AM NDT Friday 7 April 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Flurries. Low minus 4.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Flurries beginning this evening. Blowing snow over exposed areas overnight. Local amount 2 cm. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 except gusting to 70 along exposed areas of the coast late this evening and overnight. Low minus 4. Wind chill minus 11 overnight. Forecast issued 5:30 AM NDT Friday 7 April 2023
